commenter_b: I'm not pro 15, but we need to realize automation would have occurred with or without a min wage hike anyway. This just hastened it. The problem is most jobs can be made automated including yours too. I don't support give intervention but when pharmacists and construction workers find themselves out of jobs there made need to be some government regulation saying no to so much automation in the future. Human labor being supplemented by robots is not only a minimum wage concern, but one for everyone.
